text.tspan: Share of children in employment, boys vs. girls, 2016
Share of boys (vs. girls) ages 7-14 involved in economic activity for at least one hour in the reference week of the
Share of boys aged 7–14 in employment

Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
